title: In Oslo, Attorney General Warns Syria May Be A Cradle Of Terrorism
teaser: In a speech in Oslo, U.S. Attorney General Eric Holder urged European partners to do more to find and disrupt plans of would-be terrorists who head to Syria â€” and, once trained, might return to the West.
